question: Which nation houses the world's largest residential palace?
explanation: Istana Nurul Iman is the world's largest residential palace. It is located near Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei. It is the official home of the 29th Sultan of Brunei, also the seat of Brunei Government. It was constructed in 1984. It is considered to be the world's largest private residence in terms of floor area.
